article_title: Bible-citing Marine raises religious freedom questions in appeal
article_text:
Monifa F. Sterling was court-martialed for disobeying orders

U.S. Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces to hear challenge

Lawmakers and leading conservatives reinforce Sterling’s claims

article_metadata.title: Bible-citing Marine raises religious freedom questions in appeal | McClatchy DC

og.description: A North Carolina-based Marine will now get to challenge a court-martial conviction that raises tricky questions about military discipline and religious freedom.
